model.io

Class JsonSimpleReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.io.JsonSimpleReader

  • public class JsonSimpleReader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains method to read a json file with simple configurations.

    The root element of json as to be a json object.

    For example: 

      {
      "name" = "Mutation",
      "values" = [0,1,2,3,4,5],
      "matrix" = [[0,1,2,3],[4,5,6,7]]
  }

    For more advanced parse of json file use Gson.

    • Method Detail

      • read

        public static JsonSimpleReader read(java.lang.String filename)
                             throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Read the json file.
        Parameters:
        filename - the file path.
        Returns:
        a instance of this object.
        Throws:
        com.google.gson.JsonIOException - If you couldn't read an input stream or write in one.
        com.google.gson.JsonSyntaxException - if the file you are trying to read (or write) is a malformed JSON element.
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the named file does not exist, is a directory rather than a regular file, or for some other reason cannot be opened for reading.

      • readJsonString

        public static JsonSimpleReader readJsonString(java.lang.String jsonString)
        Read the json from the string passed has argument.
        Parameters:
        jsonString - a json string object.
        Returns:
        this reader.
